com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web

Class SCUIRequestValidationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web.SCUIRequestValidationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SCUIRequestValidationException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    This is a runtime exception which is thrown when an request input validation fails. asmishra
